ğŸ“„ Ğ¡ĞĞ”Ğ•Ğ Ğ–Ğ˜ĞœĞĞ• Ğ¤ĞĞ™Ğ›ĞĞ’:


// css\style.css
@charset "UTF-8";
@font-face {
  font-family: "Lato";
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 900;
  font-display: swap;
  src: url("../fonts/lato-black.woff2") format("woff2"), url("../fonts/lato-black.woff") format("woff");
}
@font-face {
  font-family: "Lato";
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-display: swap;
  src: url("../fonts/lato-bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("../fonts/lato-bold.woff") format("woff");
}
@font-face {
  font-family: "Lato";
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-display: swap;
  src: url("../fonts/lato-regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("../fonts/lato-regular.woff") format("woff");
}
/* ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ñ‹ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ:
.text-lato {
    font-family: 'Lato', sans-serif;
}
*/
:root {
  --white255: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  --black000: rgb(0, 0, 0);
}

body {
  font-family: "Lato", sans-serif;
}
body .lock {
  overflow-y: hidden;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 12px;
  background-color: #fff;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  border-radius: 10px;
  background-color: #000;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  border-radius: 10px;
  background-color: #f9f9fd;
}

.wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

.header {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 7;
}

.main {
  width: 100%;
  flex: 1 1 100%;
}

.footer {
  width: 100%;
}

.g-container {
  width: clamp(300px, 90vw, 1230px);
  margin: 0px auto;
  position: relative;
}

body,
div,
dl,
dt,
dd,
ul,
li,
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
pre,
code,
form,
fieldset,
input,
textarea,
p,
blockquote,
th,
td {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

table {
  border-collapse: collapse;
  border-spacing: 0;
}

fieldset,
img,
abbr {
  border: 0;
}

address,
caption,
cite,
code,
dfn,
em,
strong,
th,
var {
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: normal;
}

ul li {
  list-style: none;
}

caption,
th {
  text-align: left;
}

h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6 {
  font-size: 100%;
  font-weight: normal;
}

sup {
  vertical-align: text-top;
}

sub {
  vertical-align: text-bottom;
}

input,
textarea,
select {
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: inherit;
  font-weight: inherit;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
}

legend {
  color: #000;
}

article,
aside,
details,
figcaption,
figure,
footer,
header,
hgroup,
menu,
nav,
section,
main {
  display: block;
}

button {
  background-color: #fff;
  border: none;
}

a {
  color: #000;
  text-decoration-line: none;
}

img {
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}

.simple-card {
  width: 100%;
  margin-top: 30px;
}

.simple-card__block {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-left: -10px;
  margin-right: -10px;
  margin-bottom: -20px;
}

.simple__card {
  width: calc(25% - 30px);
  margin-left: 10px;
  margin-right: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 2px solid #000;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1280.98px) {
  .simple__card {
    width: calc(33.3333333333% - 30px);
  }
}

.simple__card-header {
  min-height: 200px;
  background-color: Azure;
  border-radius: 8px 8px 0px 0px;
  display: grid;
  place-items: center;
}

.simple__card-content {
  min-height: 40px;
  background-color: Beige;
  display: grid;
  place-items: center;
}

.simple__card-footer {
  min-height: 40px;
  background-color: LimeGreen;
  color: #fff;
  display: grid;
  place-items: center;
  font-weight: bold;
  border-radius: 0px 0px 8px 8px;
}

.title {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 150%;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  text-align: center;
  padding-top: clamp(30px, 2.6041666667vw, 50px);
}

.title__h1 {
  text-align: center;
  font-size: clamp(26px, 2.3958333333vw, 46px);
  font-weight: 900;
  margin-top: 8px;
}

.panel {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-top: clamp(20px, 4.4270833333vw, 85px);
}

.panel__block {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  -moz-column-gap: 12px;
       column-gap: 12px;
}

.item-tab {
  position: relative;
  color: rgb(154, 156, 165);
  padding-top: 10px;
  padding-left: 20px;
  padding-right: 40px;
  padding-bottom: 10px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.active {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  border: 1px solid rgb(255, 63, 58);
  border-radius: 4px;
  color: rgb(255, 63, 58);
}

.bottom-tab {
  font-size: clamp(14px, 0.8333333333vw, 16px);
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 160%;
}

.quantity {
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: 900;
  line-height: 150%;
  position: absolute;
  top: 9px;
  right: 24px;
}

  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 150%;
  color: rgb(154, 156, 165);
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

  width: clamp(200px, 16.3020833333vw, 313px);
  border: 1px solid rgb(215, 218, 221);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  border-radius: 4px;
  padding-top: 12px;
  padding-left: 16px;
  padding-right: 16px;
  padding-bottom: 12px;
}

.search-bottom {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

.product-card {
  margin-top: clamp(49px, 3.125vw, 60px);
}

.product-card__block {
  /* ĞĞ¸ ĞºĞ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‹ */
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;

  margin-right: -15px;
  margin-top: -40px;
}

  margin-left: 15px;
  margin-right: 15px;
  margin-top: 40px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  border: 1px solid rgb(229, 232, 237);
  border-radius: 4px;

  background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  max-width: 390px;
}

  width: 100%;
}

.product__card-content {
  padding: clamp(10px, 1.25vw, 24px);
}

.job {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 150%;

  padding: 1px 8px;
  color: rgb(229, 232, 237);
  border-radius: 4px;
}

  background-color: rgb(13, 198, 158);

  padding: 0 8px;
}

  font-size: clamp(14px, 0.9375vw, 18px);
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 150%;
  color: rgb(255, 66, 66);
}

  color: rgb(120, 122, 128);
  font-size: clamp(14px, 0.9375vw, 18px);
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 150%;
}

  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  margin-top: clamp(40px, 4.1666666667vw, 80px);
  margin-bottom: clamp(40px, 4.4791666667vw, 86px);
  row-gap: 20px;
}

  padding-left: 16px;
  color: rgb(66, 69, 81);
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 160%;
}

  position: absolute;
}

.icon-1 {
  top: -2%;
  right: -42%;
  transform: rotate(-90deg);
}

.icon-2 {
  top: 59%;
  right: -40%;
}

.icon-3 {
  top: 36%;
  left: -22%;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 1024.98px) {
  .panel {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  .panel__search {
    margin-bottom: 5px;
  }
  .panel__block {
    order: 1;
    row-gap: 5px;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1800.98px) {
  .icon {
    display: none;
  }
}
.footer {
  color: #fff;
}/*# sourceMappingURL=style.css.map */

// js\script.js
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.item-tab');

    if (tabs.length > 0) {
        tabs[0].classList.add('active');
    }

    tabs.forEach(tab => {
        tab.addEventListener('click', function () {
            tabs.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
            this.classList.add('active');
        });
    });
});




// scss\assets\components\_showMore.scss
@use "../../stl/index" as s;

.simple-card {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 30px;
}
.simple-card__block {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    margin-left: -10px;
    margin-right: -10px;
    margin-bottom: -20px;
    // column-gap: 30px;
    // row-gap: 40px;
}
.simple__card {
    width: s.colWidth(3);
    margin-left: 10px;
    margin-right: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border: 2px solid #000;
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    @include s.lg-block() {
        width: s.colWidth(4);
    }
}
.simple__card-header {
    min-height: 200px;
    background-color: Azure;
    border-radius: 8px 8px 0px 0px;
    display: grid;
    place-items: center;
}
// .simple__card-title {}
.simple__card-content {
    min-height: 40px;
    background-color: Beige;
    display: grid;
    place-items: center;
}
// .simple__card-text {}
.simple__card-footer {
    min-height: 40px;
    background-color: LimeGreen;
    color: #fff;
    display: grid;
    place-items: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    border-radius: 0px 0px 8px 8px;
}

// scss\assets\footer\_footer.scss

// scss\assets\page\main\_main.scss
@use "../../../stl/index" as s;
@use "../../components/showMore";


.title {
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 150%;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    text-align: center;
    padding-top: s.apx(50, 30);
}
.title__h1 {
    text-align: center;
    font-size: s.apx(46, 26);
    font-weight: 900;
    margin-top: 8px;
}
.panel {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    margin-top: s.apx(85, 20);
}
.panel__block {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    column-gap: 12px;
}
.item-tab {
    position: relative;
    color: rgba(154, 156, 165, 1);
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-left: 20px;
    padding-right: 40px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    cursor: pointer;
}
.active {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 63, 58, 1);
    border-radius: 4px;
    color: rgba(255, 63, 58, 1);
}
.bottom-tab {
    font-size: s.apx(16, 14);
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 160%;
    // padding: 10px 20px;
}
.quantity {
    font-size: 10px;
    font-weight: 900;
    line-height: 150%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 9px;
    right: 24px;
}
.panel__search {
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 150%;
    color: rgba(154, 156, 165, 1);
    box-sizing: border-box;
}
.search-block {
    width: s.apx(313, 200);
    border: 1px solid rgba(215, 218, 221, 1);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    border-radius: 4px;
    padding-top: 12px;
    padding-left: 16px;
    padding-right: 16px;
    padding-bottom: 12px;
}
.search-bottom {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}
.product-card {
    margin-top: s.apx(60, 49);
}
.product-card__block {
    /* ĞĞ¸ ĞºĞ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‹ */
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    margin-left: -15px;
    margin-right: -15px;
    margin-top: -40px;
}
.product-card__card {
    margin-left: 15px;
    margin-right: 15px;
    margin-top: 40px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 1px solid rgba(229, 232, 237, 1);
    border-radius: 4px;
    box-shadow: 0px 4px 4px -4px rgba(30, 33, 44, 0.03),0px 12px 10px -6px rgba(154, 156, 165, 0.04),0px 30px 24px -10px rgba(154, 156, 165, 0.05),0px 80px 80px -20px rgba(154, 156, 165, 0.08);
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
    max-width: 390px;
}
.product__card-header {
    img {
        width: 100%;
    }
}
.product__card-content {
    padding: s.apx(24, 10);
}
.job {
    display: inline-block;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 150%;
    border: 1px solid rgba(229, 232, 237, 1);
    padding: 1px 8px;
    color: rgba(229, 232, 237, 1);
    border-radius: 4px;
}
.job-color__marketing {
    background-color: rgb(13, 198, 158);
}
.job-color__management {
    background-color: rgba(90, 135, 252, 1);
}
.job-color__recruting {
    background-color: rgba(248, 152, 40, 1);
}
.job-color__design {
    background-color: rgba(255, 66, 66, 1);
}
.job-color__development {
    background-color: rgba(119, 114, 241, 1);
}
.job__discription {
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 150%;
    color: rgba(30, 33, 44, 1);
    margin-top: s.apx(20, 10);
}
.job-pice {
    display: flex;
    margin-top: s.apx(20, 10);
    span {
        padding: 0 8px;
    }
}
.pice {
    font-size: s.apx(18, 14);
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 150%;
    color: rgba(255, 66, 66, 1);
}
.name {
    color: rgba(120, 122, 128, 1);
    font-size: s.apx(18, 14);
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 150%;
}
.update__block {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    margin-top: s.apx(80, 40);
    margin-bottom: s.apx(86, 40);
    row-gap: 20px;
}
.update__text {
    padding-left: 16px;
    color: rgba(66, 69, 81, 1);
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 160%;
}
.icon {
    position: absolute;
}
.icon-1 {
    top: -2%;
    right: -42%;
    transform: rotate(-90deg);
}
.icon-2 {
    top: 59%;
    right: -40%;
}
.icon-3 {
    top: 36%;
    left: -22%;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1024.98px) {
    .panel {
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    .panel__search {
        margin-bottom: 5px;
    }
    .panel__block {
        order: 1;
        row-gap: 5px;
    }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1800.98px) {
    .icon {
        display: none;
    }
}


// scss\config\_config.scss
// ĞœĞ°ĞºÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ°Ñ ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° Ğ±ĞµĞ· Ğ¿Ğ¸ĞºÑĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹
$maxWidth: 1920;
// ĞœĞ°ĞºÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ°Ñ ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¸ĞºÑĞµĞ»ÑĞ¼Ğ¸
$maxWidthScrinPX: 1920px;
// ĞœĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ°Ñ ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° Ğ±ĞµĞ· Ğ¿Ğ¸ĞºÑĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹
$minWidth: 320;
// ĞœĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ°Ñ ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¸ĞºÑĞµĞ»ÑĞ¼Ğ¸
$minWidthScrinPX: 320px;
// Ğ¨Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° Ğ±ĞµĞ· Ğ¿Ğ¸ĞºÑĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹
$maxWidthContainerAdap: 1230;
// Ğ¨Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¸ĞºÑĞµĞ»ÑĞ¼Ğ¸
$maxWidthContainer: 1230px;
// ĞšĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğº Ğ² Ğ¼Ğ°ĞºĞµÑ‚Ğµ
$columns: 12;
$atom: calc(100% / $columns);
// ĞÑ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ñ‹ Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ´Ñƒ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ½ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¸
$offset: 30px;
// ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»Ñ Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ°
$fields: 70px;
$fields_xxlg: 70px;
$fields_xlg: 70px;
$fields_lg: 70px;
$fields_md: 50px;
$fields_sm: 30px;
$fields_xs: 15px;
$fields_xxs: 10px;

$break_xxlg: 1500.98px;
$break_xlg: 1366.98px;
$break_lg: 1280.98px;
$break_md: 1024.98px;
$break_sm: 768.98px;
$break_xs: 560.98px;
$break_xxs: 390.98px;
// ĞœĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ ÑĞºÑ€Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¼
$minWidthScrin: $minWidthScrinPX - $fields_xxs * 2;

$offset_xxlg: $offset;
$offset_xlg: $offset;
$offset_lg: $offset;
$offset_md: $offset;
$offset_sm: $offset;
$offset_xs: $offset;
$offset_xxs: $offset;

$offset_one_side: calc($offset / 2);
$offset_xxlg_one_side: calc($offset_xxlg / 2);
$offset_xlg_one_side: calc($offset_xlg / 2);
$offset_lg_one_side: calc($offset_lg / 2);
$offset_md_one_side: calc($offset_md / 2);
$offset_sm_one_side: calc($offset_sm / 2);
$offset_xs_one_side: calc($offset_xs / 2);
$offset_xxs_one_side: calc($offset_xxs / 2);


// scss\config\_fonts.scss


@font-face {
    font-family: 'Lato';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 900;
    font-display: swap;
    src: url('../fonts/lato-black.woff2') format('woff2'),
        url('../fonts/lato-black.woff') format('woff');
}

@font-face {
    font-family: 'Lato';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-display: swap;
    src: url('../fonts/lato-bold.woff2') format('woff2'),
        url('../fonts/lato-bold.woff') format('woff');
}

@font-face {
    font-family: 'Lato';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-display: swap;
    src: url('../fonts/lato-regular.woff2') format('woff2'),
        url('../fonts/lato-regular.woff') format('woff');
}


// scss\config\_functions.scss
@use "sass:math";
@use "config" as *;

$base: $maxWidth; // ĞœĞ°ĞºÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ°Ñ ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°
$minbase: $minWidth; // ĞœĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ°Ñ ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°  

@function vw($value) {
    @return $value / $base * 100vw;
}

@function px($value) {
    // @return $value / $base * 100vw;
    @return calc(100vw / $base * $value);
}

@function apx($maxValue, $minValue) {
    $min: $minValue + px;
    $max: $maxValue + px;
    @return clamp($min, px($maxValue), $max);
}
@function clampCustom($maxValue, $minValue) {
    $min: $minValue + px;
    $max: $maxValue + px;
    @return clamp($min, $varAdaptiv, $max);
}
@function colWidth($n) {
    // $val: 100% / $columns * $n;
    $val: math.div(100%, $columns) * $n;
    @return calc(#{$val} - #{$offset})
}
@function rems($px) {
    $rem: "rem";
    // @return math.div($px, 16);
    @return math.div($px, 16) + rem;
}

// scss\config\_global.scss
@use "./config" as *;
@use "./var" as *;
@use "./mixins" as *;

body {
    // box-sizing: border-box;
    font-family: 'Lato', sans-serif;
    .lock {
        overflow-y: hidden;
    }
}

::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 12px;
    background-color: #fff;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    border-radius: 10px;
    background-color: #000;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px rgba(#000, 20%);
    border-radius: 10px;
    background-color: #f9f9fd;
}
.wrapper {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    min-height: 100vh;
}
.header {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: 7;
}
.main {
    // margin-top: $heightHeader;
    width: 100%;
    flex: 1 1 100%;
}

.footer {
    width: 100%;
    // margin-top: auto;
}

.g-container {
    // box-sizing: border-box;
    width: clamp($minWidthScrin, 90vw, $maxWidthContainer); // Ğ ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¸
    margin: 0px auto;
    position: relative;
    // @include widthĞ¡anvas(); // Ğ¨Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° + Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ + Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ñ‹ ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ»ĞµĞ²Ğ°
    // @include mediaCanvas($break_xxlg, $fields_xxlg);// Ğ¨Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° + Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ + Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ñ‹ ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ»ĞµĞ²Ğ°
    // @include mediaCanvas($break_xlg, $fields_xlg);// Ğ¨Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° + Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ + Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ñ‹ ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ»ĞµĞ²Ğ°
    // @include mediaCanvas($break_lg, $fields_lg);// Ğ¨Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° + Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ + Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ñ‹ ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ»ĞµĞ²Ğ°
    // @include mediaCanvas($break_md, $fields_md);// Ğ¨Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° + Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ + Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ñ‹ ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ»ĞµĞ²Ğ°
    // @include mediaCanvas($break_sm, $fields_sm);// Ğ¨Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° + Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ + Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ñ‹ ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ»ĞµĞ²Ğ°
    // @include mediaCanvas($break_xs, $fields_xs);// Ğ¨Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ° + Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğµ + Ğ¾Ñ‚ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ñ‹ ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ»ĞµĞ²Ğ°
}



// scss\config\_mixins.scss
@use "./_config.scss" as s;

@mixin widthĞ¡anvas($canvas: $maxWidthContainer, $indent: $fields) {
    max-width: calc($canvas + $indent * 2);
    padding-left: $indent;
    padding-right: $indent;
    margin: 0px auto;
}

@mixin mediaCanvas($canvas: s.$break_lg, $indent: s.$fields) {
    @media screen and (max-width: $canvas) {
        max-width: calc($canvas + $indent * 2);
        padding-left: $indent;
        padding-right: $indent;
        margin: 0px auto;
    }
}
@mixin margin-flex($value: s.$offset_no_px / 2, $val_bottom: 0) {
    margin-left: #{$value}px;
    margin-right: #{$value}px;
    @if $val_bottom == 0 {
        
    }@else {
        margin-bottom: #{$val_bottom}px;
    }
}
@mixin mediaMaxMin($max_width, $min_width) {
    @media screen and (min-width: $min_width) and (max-width: $max_width) {
        @content;
    }
}
@mixin mediaMax($max-width: s.$break_lg) {
    @media screen and (max-width: $max-width) {
        @content;
    }
}

@mixin mediaMin($min-width: s.$break_lg) {
    @media screen and (min-width: $min-width) {
        @content;
    }
}
@mixin widthColumn($n) {
    $p: $n - 1;
    $k: $columns - 1;
    @for $i from 1 through $columns {
        @if $n == 1 {
        width: calc((100% - $k * $offset) / $columns * $n);
        }@else if $n == $i {
        width: calc((100% - $k * $offset) / $columns * $n + ($offset * $p));
        }
    }
}
// ======================= Grid mixins =====================================
@mixin col() {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    @include col-offsets(margin);
}
@mixin col-offsets($type){
    #{$type}-left: s.$offset_one_side;
    #{$type}-right: s.$offset_one_side;
}
@mixin size($n){
    $val: 100% / s.$columns * $n;
    width: #{calc(#{$val} - #{s.$offset})};
}

@mixin size-xxlg($n){
    $val: 100% / s.$columns * $n;
    @include xxlg(width, #{calc(#{$val} - #{s.$offset_xxlg})});
}

@mixin size-xlg($n){
    $val: 100% / s.$columns * $n;
    @include xlg(width, #{calc(#{$val} - #{s.$offset_xlg})});
}

@mixin size-lg($n){
    $val: 100% / s.$columns * $n;
    @include lg(width, #{calc(#{$val} - #{s.$offset_lg})});
}

@mixin size-md($n){
    $val: 100% / s.$columns * $n;
    @include md(width, #{calc(#{$val} - #{s.$offset_md})});
}

@mixin size-sm($n){
    $val: 100% / s.$columns * $n;
    @include sm(width, #{calc(#{$val} - #{s.$offset_sm})});
}

@mixin size-xs($n){
    $val: 100% / s.$columns * $n;
    @include xs(width, #{calc(#{$val} - #{s.$offset_xs})});
}

@mixin size-xxs($n){
    $val: 100% / s.$columns * $n;
    @include xxs(width, #{calc(#{$val} - #{s.$offset_xxs})});
}

@mixin xxlg-block() {
    @media screen and (max-width: $break_xxlg) {
        @content;
    }
}

@mixin xlg-block() {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_xlg) {
        @content;
    }
}

@mixin lg-block() {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_lg) {
        @content;
    }
}

@mixin md-block() {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_md) {
        @content;
    }
}

@mixin sm-block() {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_sm) {
        @content;
    }
}

@mixin xs-block() {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_xs) {
        @content;
    }
}

@mixin xxs-block() {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_xxs) {
        @content;
    }
}

@mixin xxlg($name, $value) {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_xxlg) {
        #{$name}: $value;
    }
}
@mixin xlg($name, $value) {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_xlg) {
        #{$name}: $value;
    }
}
@mixin lg($name, $value) {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_lg) {
        #{$name}: $value;
    }
}
@mixin md($name, $value) {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_md) {
        #{$name}: $value;
    }
}
@mixin sm($name, $value) {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_sm) {
        #{$name}: $value;
    }
}
@mixin xs($name, $value) {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_xs) {
        #{$name}: $value;
    }
}
@mixin xxs($name, $value) {
    @media screen and (max-width: s.$break_xxs) {
        #{$name}: $value;
    }
}



// scss\config\_reset.scss

    body,
    div,
    dl,
    dt,
    dd,
    ul,
    li,
    h1,
    h2,
    h3,
    h4,
    h5,
    h6,
    pre,
    code,
    form,
    fieldset,
    input,
    textarea,
    p,
    blockquote,
    th,
    td {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }

    table {
        border-collapse: collapse;
        border-spacing: 0;
    }

    fieldset,
    img,
    abbr {
        border: 0;
    }

    address,
    caption,
    cite,
    code,
    dfn,
    em,
    strong,
    th,
    var {
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: normal;
    }

    ul li {
        list-style: none;
    }

    caption,
    th {
        text-align: left;
    }

    h1,
    h2,
    h3,
    h4,
    h5,
    h6 {
        font-size: 100%;
        font-weight: normal;
    }

    sup {
        vertical-align: text-top;
    }

    sub {
        vertical-align: text-bottom;
    }

    input,
    textarea,
    select {
        font-family: inherit;
        font-size: inherit;
        font-weight: inherit;
        border: none;
        outline: none;
    }

    legend {
        color: #000;
    }

    article,
    aside,
    details,
    figcaption,
    figure,
    footer,
    header,
    hgroup,
    menu,
    nav,
    section,
    main {
        display: block;
    }
    button {
        background-color: #fff;
        border: none;
    }
    a {
        color: #000;
        text-decoration-line: none;
    }
    img {
        max-width: 100%;
        height: auto;
    }


// scss\config\_var.scss
// @use "./config";

:root {
    --white255: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    --black000: rgb(0, 0, 0);
}
$varAdaptiv: 90vw;
$heightHeader: 80px;

␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½␀ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½
